original_text: Then the high priest rose up, and all they that were with him, (which is the sect of the Sadducees,) and were filled with indignation,
korean_text: 대제사장과 그와 함께 있는 사람 즉 사두개인의 당파가 다 마음에 시기가 가득하여 일어나서

sentences.original_text: Then the high priest rose up
and all they that were with him
which is the sect of the Sadducees
